parameters.name: coverage_category
parameters.description:
Specify what coverage rate to be calculated.

                                            Area = Tire area

                                            ArcLength = contour perimeter length

                                            Mean = Average pixel value
"

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: The interval factor used to calculate coverage.

parameters.name: max_range
parameters.description: The max_range factor used in coverage calculations.

measures.name: coverage_total_measures
measures.description: Overall coverage within the expected range.

measures.name: coverage_each_measures
measures.description: Each class coverage within the expected range.
